LanguageData.Nearmaere_Artificial.label: Artificial Race
LanguageData.Nearmaere_Artificial.description: Nearmare are an artifically created race that specialize in mental attacks. They are resistant to mental attacks, but have decreased resistance to disease and are slow to develop immunity.
